prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Abstract of Lundsgaard, Konrad Kristian Karl, Brillernes Historie (The History of Spectacles), Crerar Ms 63, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph abstract in English by J. Christian Bay, after Lundsgaard's Brillernes historie (Copenhagen: V. Trynde, 1913), on the history of corrective lenses. Illustrated with sketches. Presented to Crerar Library by J. Christian Bay. Bound in olive buckram.
